column2: The most important piece in the game. Can move in any direction by 1 square only.
The most powerful piece in the game. Can move in any direction without limits
The piece with the trickiest moves in the game. Can move in an L shape.
A piece that can move in any diagonal direction without limits
The second most powerful piece in the game. Can move horizontally and vertically without limits
The least important piece in the game. Can move forward only by 1 step and captures pieces diagonally.
